content: Hi! Maybe not the best place to bring this up but we decided to do biweekly meetings like Error Handling does because it seemed a bit silly to do weekly meetings when we wouldn't always get much progress in a week due to the limits of personal time ^^;. It would be nice if someone would mangle the T-libs calendar appropriately or authorize my Google account to be able to do so. Thanks!
@Jubilee if you DM me your google account, i can give you access to edit it
